title: Looking for someone to teach me how to play LoL better. (I'm friendly/chill/quiet person)
body: last time i play alot was back in season 1 or 2. since then only been on when friend wants me to play all for one or doom bots and other ones but other then that i havnt play. I want to get back into it again and maybe get into ranking. Just looking at my collection i have no clue what champs are top/mid/jungle/botton and support anymore.  If someone willing to teach im willing to learn.

replies.body:
Hi there! I'm by no means a great player, but if it's the absolute basics you're after I'm happy to teach them to you! If you don't mind being taught by a bit of a noob then feel free to ask!

Username: Thaura
I don't mind, any help is welcome to me. The more help i can get the better.

Hi, I noticed that near your name it says NA, are you playing on the North American server? Back in season 1-2 there was no oceanic server only the NA one. You can move your account to the OCE servers :) you will get a much better ping. If you click your account icon you will see the different countries you can select to move your account. This was free when it first happened I think you need to pay for it now.

[Image of your account icon](http://iforce.co.nz/i/5ipqrpzs.p5h.jpg)

If you decide to move you account feel free to add me, can help with the basics :)

I'll be honest i didnt notice that lol. thats my bad. well i dont have the money to tranfer servers atm, but i can make new account. If still wanting to help me. fresh account for fresh new start lol. up to you.

username:Levolt
Yeah sure will add you tonight. I have a new account I am working on as well so can jam a couple of games.

I coached professionally in Dota 2 and it would be interesting to see how that applies to league, It'd be fun to play some games with a chill guy and teach you a bit.
Name: Fangere123 (on oceanic servers)

Lol well thats my bad, I didn't see OCE on here.  Thinking just to make a new account. if your still willing to teach ofc. Not that i had much to begin with this account. Bysides I still need to pick some type of role. 
Username: Levolt
